title: (x) Rabbi Frand on the Parashah - Bandolero {Nicolai}
content:
What is this font name ![FONT PREVIEW](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/43195.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Slab serif font - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6276 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Suite magazine - by Inigo Jerez {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6277 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: I think it is [Bandolero](http://web.archive.org/web/20071210203900/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/bandolero/bandolero/testdrive.html?s=Rabbi%2BFrand%2BParash&p=60) with a modified F

Thank You Yes it is, Thank You very much.   
   
Mechel
